### EmitNops {#a8540d3305b5e9e8d7e75c0db59b3644d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MCAlignFragment::EmitNops">
Flag to indicate that (optimal) NOPs should be emitted instead of using the provided value.

The exact interpretation of this flag is target dependent.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00256">256</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.
